title: Drawing, June 1, 1901
medium: Brush and gray wash, graphite on cream-colored  wove paper.
signed: Signed with initials and dated in graphite ?, lower right ?: June 1st 1901 T M.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite ?, lower right: Baking pottery at / Luguna, N. M. / June 1st 1901 T M/ Brown manure/ A bit of Laguana 1901.

Verso: Inscribed in ink, upper left corner: No. 303
description: Horizontal view of two potters at work in left foreground; houses, with a church at right, across middleground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, June 1, 1901.
June 1, 1901. Brush and gray wash, graphite on cream-colored  wove paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-78.
